resources.string: This is a simple, easy to use and a learning app that is built using Android Text-to-Speech API.
User can hear pronunciation in different languages at adjustable speech rate.
User can also save pronunciation as an Audio file into device.
The motive behind the development of this app is to take benefit of an Android\'s inbuilt functionality in a useful manner.
Click View List button to view previously saved files.
Click settings icon located at bottom right side.
You can switch between Language Accent and Speed.
Turn On Autosave audio to save pronunciation into device.
